sense.name: a geometric spatial extension
sense.examples: Draw a line to bisect the rectangle into two equal regions. What is the region occupied by a cube having a side of 3 inches? The region of space around a black hole is highly curved.

sense.name: an anatomical functional area of a body
sense.examples: The patient reported pains in the abdominal region. The MRI revealed a small blockage in the region of the cerebral cortex.

sense.name: a geographical area of the earth, characterized in some way
sense.examples: Our journey took us through some lovely farming regions of France. There are fields of sea ice forming in regions near the south pole. Silicon Valley remains a region of innovative high technology.

sense.name: an approximate quantity
sense.examples: Their annual sales are in the region of about $30 million. It will take in the region of two or three months to complete this job.

sense.name: a subject domain, topic
sense.examples: We are entering the region of speculation, not fact, with these statements. He studies an esoteric region of materials science.

sense.name: an administrative district, e.g., of a city government
sense.examples: He is an administrator for the whole region of the state. Their city government is divided into five regions.
